document_data.name: Stoner's Needle
document_data.mainbody: '''Stoner's Needle''', also called '''Needle Rock''', was a rocky spire in the [[Sword Coast]] lands.<ref group="note">The exact location of Stoner's Needle is unknown from ''[[The Bounty Seekers Of Manshaka]]'', but the sequence of events suggests it is not far outside [[Waterdeep]]. The nearby [[Sword Mountains]] are a possibility. However, the artwork and conversation depict barren, rocky hills, while the [[bounty seekers]] cross a stream or river, which may be the [[River Dessarin]]. These suggest Stoner's Needle to be located in one of the ranges of hills lying east of Waterdeep, such as the [[Forlorn Hills]]/[[Fallen Hills]] (apparently bleak and once a [[dwarf]] realm) or the [[Larch Hills]].
